TabControl.name: ABot
TabControl.OnSelect: switch ${This.SelectedTab} { Case Main UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[320] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[250] break Case Healer UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Combat UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Triggers UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break }

TabControl.name: MainSubTab
TabControl.OnSelect: switch ${This.SelectedTab} { Case MainT UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[320] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[250] break Case BuffWatch UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Sell UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Logs UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break Case Mobs UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetWidth[400] UIElement[VGA_gui]:SetHeight[640] break }

checkbox.Name: doTrigger1
checkbox.Text: Use Trigger 1 (TRIGGERS ARE NOT WORKING YET)

checkbox.Name: doOtherAgroT1
checkbox.Text: Agro Is Not On A Tank Class
